name: Mootation!
description:
Breed cows in different environments to see what kind of milk they produce!

Made by Pie Gulp Games for Discord Jam #5!

Controls:

LMB: Move cows/place fields

RMB: Cancel placing fields

WASD: Move camera

QE or scroll wheel: Zoom

We ran out of time to add controls tutorial to game, sorry!

We also ran out of time to finish the art, so please forgive all the placeholders! 

The game is still playable, just not as pretty as it could be.

BUGFIX [+10min after submissions closed] - Cows were mooing too often, reduced the rate to be less annoying

BUGFIX [+15min] - Zoom was completely broken on web build, is now disabled
